abstract: Two Nevada counties and several mining companies are challenging Interior Department's new restrictions on mining, energy development and grazing intended to protect endangered greater sage grouse.
lead_paragraph: Two Nevada counties and some mining companies want a court to block new restrictions on mining, energy development and grazing that are meant to protect a declining bird species.

headline.main: Challenge in Nevada to Plans to Protect Sage Grouse
headline.print_headline: Challenge in Nevada to Plans to Protect Sage Grouse

snippet: Two Nevada counties and some mining companies want a court to block new restrictions on mining, energy development and grazing that are meant to protect a declining bird species.
